Message:
I became a witch,
and without hesitation
decided to help those
affected by the Curse.
But I was still weak as a Viking,

In the battle against
the endless horde of creatures,

It made me have nightmares...
of my village in ruins...
and the cries of the people
I couldn’t save.

And when it looked like
I was gonna get swallowed up
by my despair...

and nowhere near as strong
as Queen Amleth.

the light from the crystals
slowly consumed me.
